newsitem.title: USA: GT Interactive files for share offer.
newsitem.headline: GT Interactive files for share offer.

text.p: GT Interactive Software Corp said on Friday that it filed a follow-on registration statement with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission for a 15.5 million share offering.
Certain GT shareholders were offering 11.1 million shares and GT was offering four million shares, the company said.
GT, which publishes interactive entertainment software, completed an initial public offering in December 1995.

Robertson, Stephens and Co, Merrill Lynch & Co, Bear, Stearns and Co Inc, Hambrecht & Quist LLC, Lehman Brothers Inc and Piper Jaffray Inc were managing the deal. Underwriters would have an option to buy another 2.33 million shares to cover over-allotments, the company said.
